column2: Modern medical technology enables the complete rewiring of an individual's personality through a combination of neurosurgery, psychological conditioning, and psychotropic drugs. These techniques can be used to render a potential troublemaker passive and docile. The process is considered to be a brutal violation of human rights, and potential side-effects include permanent injury and death.
This act is considered tyrannial and will decrease all vassals opinion of you by 20.\n

The guards come to collect you from your cell while you sleep. When you awaken, they restrain you and inject you with a sedative, leaving you barely conscious, but not aware enough to resist. You are dragged to a medical facility, where some part of you soon recognizes what's about to happen - neural pacification.

The screaming finally stops after several hours, and you arrive at the medical bay to see the guards dragging away the limp form of [From.GetFullName]. The chief technician hands you a datapad displaying the results of the neural pacification treatment.
Your [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetFullName], was killed in prison by [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] after [From.GetSheHe] attempted to subject [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to neural pacification.
